events.content:
Could you help me enhance this React Native subscription banner? I need a loading skeleton while pricing loads and I'd like a Jest + Testing Library test that covers the CTA press. Here's the component as it exists now:```tsx
export const SubscriptionBanner = ({ price, onSubscribe }) => (
  <View style={{ backgroundColor: '#121826', padding: 16, borderRadius: 16 }}>
    <Text style={{ color: 'white', fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '700' }}>Go Pro</Text>
    <Text style={{ color: '#c7cdd9', marginTop: 6 }}>Unlock unlimited debates and transcripts.</Text>
    <Text style={{ color: '#90caf9', marginTop: 12 }}>{price ? `$${price}/mo` : '...loading'}</Text>
    <Pressable onPress={onSubscribe} style={{ marginTop: 16, backgroundColor: '#4c8fff', paddingVertical: 12, borderRadius: 12, alignItems: 'center' }}>
      <Text style={{ color: 'white', fontWeight: '600' }}>Start 7-day free trial</Text>
    </Pressable>
  </View>
);
```
What other improvements should we make?
